QuestData.Title: By Blood and Ash
QuestData.Description: The time has come, $n. If we're going to put a dent in their numbers, the time is now.$B$BWe have the position.$B$BWe have the firepower.$B$BAll that remains to be seen is whether we have the courage... and I sure don't see a coward standing in front of me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 80 Bloodfang Stalkers using the Rebel Cannons.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. You've done more than could be asked of any Gilnean.$B$BWe're running low on ammunition. It's time to regroup inside now.
